name: 李弘毅
objective:
本課程內容包括﹕熱力學第一定律、熱力學第二定律、結合兩定律之可用能、單相系統、可用能分析、多相系統、動力廠、冷凍、熱力最佳化、不可逆熱力學。
The contents of this course include the first law of thermodynamics, the second law of thermodynamics, the two laws combined in analysis: the destruction of exergy, single-phase systems, exergy analysis, multiphase systems, refrigeration, thermodynamic optimization, and irreversible thermodynamics.
schedule:
1. Introduction and Basic Concepts
2. Energy, Energy Transfer, and General Energy Analysis
3. Thermodynamic Properties
4. Energy Analysis of Closed Systems
5. Energy Analysis of Control Volumes
6. The Second Law of Thermodynamics
7. Entropy Analysis
8. Entropy Analysis
9. Midterm Exam
10. Exergy Analysis
11. Exergy Analysis
12. Thermodynamic Property Relations
13. Thermodynamic Property Relations
14. Power Cycles
15. Power Cycles
16. Refrigeration Cycles
17. Refrigeration Cycles
18. Final Exam
materials:
Textbook:
Thermodynamics: An Engineering Approach (9th Edition),Yunus A. Cengel, Michael A. Boles, Mehmet Kanoglu, McGraw-Hill, 2019.
References:
Fundamentals of thermodynamics (SI Edition), Claus Borgnakk
consultation: 開學後建立高等工程熱力學課程 Line 群組
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG7：可負擔的潔淨能源（Affordable and Clean Energy）
